articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy Z Fold3 foldable phone at lower price point - TechCentral
articles.description: The Galaxy Z Fold3 and Z Flip3 will launch on 27 August starting in markets such as the US and Europe. South African pricing and a local launch date will the unveiled later on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Samsung Electronics unveiled its latest high-end foldable smartphones on Wednesday with lower prices than last year’s offerings in a push to expand foldable demand beyond niche devices.

articles.content:
